description: Gets information about a monitor in Amazon CloudWatch Internet Monitor based on a monitor name. The information returned includes the Amazon Resource Name (ARN), create time, modified time, resources included in the monitor, and status information.

nested_items.name: MonitorName
nested_items.description: The name of the monitor.

nested_items.name: MonitorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: The resources monitored by the monitor. Resources are listed by their Amazon Resource Names (ARNs).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the monitor.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the monitor was created.

nested_items.name: ModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The last time that the monitor was modified.

nested_items.name: ProcessingStatus
nested_items.description: The health of the data processing for the monitor.

nested_items.name: ProcessingStatusInfo
nested_items.description: Additional information about the health of the data processing for the monitor.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MaxCityNetworksToMonitor
nested_items.description: The maximum number of city-networks to monitor for your resources. A city-network is the location (city) where clients access your application resources from and the ASN or network provider, such as an internet service provider (ISP), that clients access the resources through. This limit can help control billing costs.

nested_items.name: InternetMeasurementsLogDelivery
nested_items.description: Publish internet measurements for Internet Monitor to another location, such as an Amazon S3 bucket. The measurements are also published to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: BucketPrefix
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket prefix.

nested_items.name: LogDeliveryStatus
nested_items.description: The status of publishing Internet Monitor internet measurements to an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: TrafficPercentageToMonitor
nested_items.description: The percentage of the internet-facing traffic for your application to monitor with this monitor. If you set a city-networks maximum, that limit overrides the traffic percentage that you set.

nested_items.name: HealthEventsConfig
nested_items.description: The list of health event threshold configurations. The threshold percentage for a health score determines, along with other configuration information, when Internet Monitor creates a health event when there's an internet issue that affects your application end users.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityScoreThreshold
nested_items.description: The health event threshold percentage set for availability scores.

nested_items.name: PerformanceScoreThreshold
nested_items.description: The health event threshold percentage set for performance scores.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityLocalHealthEventsConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration that determines the threshold and other conditions for when Internet Monitor creates a health event for a local availability issue.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of whether Internet Monitor creates a health event based on a threshold percentage set for a local health score. The status can be ENABLED or DISABLED.

nested_items.name: HealthScoreThreshold
nested_items.description: The health event threshold percentage set for a local health score.

nested_items.name: MinTrafficImpact
nested_items.description: The minimum percentage of overall traffic for an application that must be impacted by an issue before Internet Monitor creates an event when a threshold is crossed for a local health score.

nested_items.name: PerformanceLocalHealthEventsConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration that determines the threshold and other conditions for when Internet Monitor creates a health event for a local performance issue.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of whether Internet Monitor creates a health event based on a threshold percentage set for a local health score. The status can be ENABLED or DISABLED.

nested_items.name: HealthScoreThreshold
nested_items.description: The health event threshold percentage set for a local health score.

nested_items.name: MinTrafficImpact
nested_items.description: The minimum percentage of overall traffic for an application that must be impacted by an issue before Internet Monitor creates an event when a threshold is crossed for a local health score.
